B1 [ C ] a disease of the body or mind: He died at home after a long illness.
B2 [ U ] the state of being ill: She had five days off work due to illness.
More examplesFewer examplesWe are lacking three members of staff due to illness.Many people suffer from some form of mental illness during their lives.Symptoms of the illness include a high temperature and a persistent dry cough.Many illnesses which once killed are today curable.Four million hours were lost last year through stress-related illnesses.
